py: rúguǒ nǐ zài shēnrù jiēchù zhīhòu
♫ měi yī bǐ dōu shì nǐ de míngzì ♫
en: If you find that unattractive about me

zh: 如果你在深入接触之后
py: Rúguǒ nǐ zài shēnrù jiēchù zhīhòu
♫ měi yī bǐ dōu shì nǐ de míngzì ♫
fāxiàn bù xǐhuān wǒ zhè yīdiǎn
♫ Měi yī bǐ dōu shì nǐ de míngzì ♫
fāxiàn bù xǐhuān wǒ zhè yīdiǎn
duì wǒ yīdiǎn hǎogǎn dōu méiyǒu
en: you don't have any feelings for me,

py: ♫ yě huì jìdé ài nǐ zhè jiàn shì ♫
en: the most suitable way to end it.

py: ♫ Yě huì jìdé ài nǐ zhè jiàn shì ♫
en: We can even cancel the engagement at any time.

py: bù huì ràng nǐ wéinán de
en: I won't make things hard for you.

py: wǒ néng wèn gè wèntí ma
en: Can I ask you a question?

py: kě wǒ duì nǐ de jiātíng
♫ yíshī céng lèi liú de cóngqián ♫
en: My ancestral family is from Zhenjiang.

zh: 你应该很快就会知道了
py: ♫ Yíshī céng lèi liú de cóngqián ♫
nǐ yīnggāi hěn kuài jiù huì zhīdàole
♫ měi yī bǐ dōu shì nǐ de míngzì ♫

zh: 不会再打扰你的生活了
py: ♫ Měi yī bǐ dōu shì nǐ de míngzì ♫
bù huì zài dǎrǎo nǐ de shēnghuóle
en: In that case, I won't disturb you

py: ♫ Měi yī bǐ dōu shì nǐ de míngzì ♫
♫ Měi yī bǐ dōu shì nǐ de míngzì ♫
wǒ méi xiǎngdào nǐ huì dāyìng
♫ yě huì jìdé ài nǐ zhè jiàn shì ♫
en: I didn't expect you to say yes.

py: ♫ Yě huì jìdé ài nǐ zhè jiàn shì ♫

en: You can still change your mind.

zh: 那接下来我们要做什么
py: nà jiē xiàlái wǒmen yào zuò shénme
en: So what do we do next?

zh: 九十二 六十二 九十

en: Could you give me a second?
I can't believe I said yes.

zh: 你的颈围 手臂上部
py: nǐ de jǐng wéi shǒubì shàngbù
en: I may also need to know
your neck circumference, the measurements of your upper arm,

zh: 小臂 腕部 小腿 大腿
py: Xiǎo bì wàn bù xiǎotuǐ dàtuǐ
Hái yǒu jiǎo wàn de chǐcùn
wǒ liàng hǎole fā gěi nǐ
en: Then I'll come back to you

py: Nà kěndìng shì xīnlǐ miàn yǒu nǐ
Dì yī cì diànhuà chī xiāoyè
en: The first time you called, you had a midnight supper.

py: Dì èr cì diànhuà jiù qiúhūn
en: The second time you called, you asked for her hand in marriage.

py: jiù hé nǐ de shíyàn yīyàng

zh: 不也通过半年的邮件吗
py: bù yě tōngguò bànnián de yóujiàn ma
en: Didn't we communicate with each other
with email for six months already?

py: Nǐ zài chángshì shuōfú zìjǐ ma
en: Are you trying to convince yourself?
You have to believe in yourself.

py: Qù zhǔnbèi míngtiān de shàngmén lǐ
en: To prepare a gift for her parents tomorrow.

zh: 这一定是个天大的八卦
py: zhè yīdìng shìgè tiān dà de bāguà
en: This must be the biggest gossip in the world.
but my heart is already racing!

zh: 我现在就开门宣布喜讯
py: wǒ xiànzài jiù kāimén xuānbù xǐxùn
en: i'll open the door and announce the news now.

py: Wǒ bà mā hái bù zhīdào
en: My parents don't know about this yet.
Are you doing a flash marriage?
We've known each other for six months already.

zh: 怎么和他们解释 好吗
py: Nǐ ràng wǒ hǎohǎo xiǎng xiǎng
zěnme hé tāmen jiěshì hǎo ma
en: how to explain this to my parents, okay?

zh: 林叔 你帮我看一看
py: Lín shū nǐ bāng wǒ kàn yī kàn
en: Uncle Lin, could you help me
You've come to the right person for that.
Although Uncle Lin had a relationship in the past,

py: Kě yě méi dào gěi yuèfù jiā
en: I never had to give a gift

py: Zhè nǎ shì wèn duì rénle
Jiāng a háishì lǎo de là

en: I will help you choose something. Let's go.

zh: 干吗呀 那么神秘啊
en: are you hiding something from me?

py: Zuìjìn shàngkè tǐng xīnkǔ de ba
en: Classes have been tough lately, right?

py: Nǐ gěi wǒ shǎo lái zhè tào
en: I know what you're up to.

py: Jiù nǐ xiàwǔ shuō dì nàgè ya
en: The one you mentioned this afternoon?
Didn't you two just start dating?
But he really wanted to get engaged.
Have you given it some thought?
I just wanted to say yes.

zh: 我没想过他会突然求婚
py: Wǒ méi xiǎngguò tā huì túrán qiúhūn
en: I didn't think he would suddenly propose to me.

py: wǒ zhēn de méi fǎ lǐjiě
Zhè màn man lái bu xíng a

en: I don't know how to explain it to you.

zh: 你见到他一定会喜欢的
py: Nǐ jiàn dào tā yīdìng huì xǐhuān de
en: You'll like him when you see him.

py: Fùmǔ yòu shì zuò shénme de
en: And what do his parents do?

zh: 这事你下午没跟我说啊
py: zhè shì nǐ xiàwǔ méi gēn wǒ shuō a
en: You didn't tell me about it this afternoon.

zh: 这事你下午没跟我说啊
py: Zhè shì nǐ xiàwǔ méi gēn wǒ shuō a
en: You didn't tell me about it this afternoon.

py: nà jiù yuē dào zhè'er lái
Dàjiā yì kuài chī gè fàn ba

zh: 我们见完面以后再讨论
py: wǒmen jiàn wán miàn yǐhòu zài tǎolùn
en: we have to have another discussion
He said he would come tomorrow.

py: zhè zhēn de yǒu nàme zhāojí ma
en: Is he really in such a hurry?
